meanings.sent1: She keratinized her hair to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The nail keratinized as it grew longer.
meanings.sent3: The chef keratinized the meat to give it a crispy texture.
meanings.sent4: His determination keratinized into a solid resolve.
meanings.sent5: The sun's heat keratinized the clay into a hard brick.

meanings.sent1: Over time, the skin keratinized to protect itself.
meanings.sent2: The callus on his hand keratinized from constant friction.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar will keratinize into a butterfly one day.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas slowly keratinized into a well-developed plan.
meanings.sent5: The seed will keratinize into a strong root in the soil.

meanings.definition: Covered with a layer of keratin.
meanings.sent1: The keratinized scales of the reptile provided protection.
meanings.sent2: The bird's keratinized beak helped it crack open seeds.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's keratinized suit made him invincible to attacks.
meanings.sent4: Her keratinized nails were perfectly manicured.
meanings.sent5: The turtle's keratinized shell shielded it from harm.
